channel.title: [PI] Error out of nowhere
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm just updating like spawn-config files and than I get this error:
[code=java]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Than I change it to the way it was, compile again, run the server again and the error stays.. Any ideas?

item.title: [PI] Error out of nowhere
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

Your computer is running out of memory (RAM), try closing a few programs down and if all else fails, Edit your run.bat and reduce the
-Xmx value. Mines on -Xmx800m (800Mb) for around 3Gb RAM, I would suggest no less than 256m

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Error out of nowhere
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:
@PriMaL_PvP wrote:

You have to many java programs running. pelase close a few of them before you start your client, or server

Read full topic
